column5: A ticket has been registered with Invision. I'll keep you posted on this thread.
Thanks brudder.
Site has been upgraded to the newest version which includes the most recent security patches. As of 12:08 pm today.
I have noticed. Awesome.  Thank you me brudder.
seems to be working here too Roy...Cheers....this message is brought to you the old fashion way without having to use "more reply options"  edit to add profile is accessable again ...

Thank you as always Roy for getting invision to get rid of of a few more glitches. We have unfortunately had to keep our upgrades up to date which changes the way the board looks and works to keep us from getting hacked and viruses. I am impressed with the way invision has keep us out of deep trouble over the years they seem to be worth all of the money we pay them. Granted there are cheaper companies but we get what we pay for.    Art

Art i was getting pop up ads to the right of any thread i opened...do i need to diet? foods not to eat etc... it was going on for a few days but i just thought i was going to have to get used to closing them ....thankfully they are gone now..(but i probably could use a diet) but hey ...i like bananas
Same here. Drives me nuts. I actually view ofc on my PC in mobile mode, and still have to manually change it on my phone. Even if I don't log out. There's gotta be a way to fix this, no?  S

Warning: Base directory HTML_PURIFIER_PATHcache/tmp does not exist, please create or change using %Cache.SerializerPath in /home/ofncommu/public_html/forums/ips_kernel/HTMLPurifier/HTMLPurifier/DefinitionCache/Serializer.php on line133{"success":1,"post":"\n\n

As I went to post  Warning: Base directory HTML_PURIFIER_PATHcache/tmp does not exist, please create or change using %Cache.SerializerPath in/home/ofncommu/public_html/forums/ips_kernel/HTMLPurifier/HTMLPurifier/DefinitionCache/Serializer.phpon line 133
you are looking at too much porn on your computer..
NO SIR.
probably right. no such thing as too much hahahaha
Only site this happens.
I was getting that earlier too Brian when i went to post and it posted my content twice.
I just posted in Photos and no problem. It seems random.
maybe it's mad at you   lol
I got an error like that yesterday when I was trying to send a PM...It ended up sending 2 duplicate messages to that person
Ok BOSS,whats up?  I had to refresh to see my reply.???????
I always have to refresh to see new contents,but I think your talking about something different?.You'll get it resolved B.The byes will get back to you.
Yup waaaayyyy too much pron.
Thanks for the re-directed new spot Mike. Give it a go in the morning. Maybe aint that bad after all.  DAMIT REFRESH TO SEE AGAIN.
Mr. B, I think these interweb gods are trying to give you a hint! lol Actually no idea what is happening to you.
Ah the real MR.B  Nice to hear from you,and yes,you maybe on to something here,,,,,,,,,,,
Its the Russians......................................... I had the same the other day - went to post and it turned into a very long string of symbols. refreshed and all good?
Ya I had the same thing when I tried to post a report with photos.

ive had that too....also i cant post in the quick replay section...my writing comes up light grey as opposed to black....i have to click on the more posting options button to post anything...i thought i was put on mod Q for whatever reason and was smart enough to work it out that i could still post...lol

cant edit or open my profile either but i noticed just now my enable HTML button was not checked .... now i can edit...but got a message stating THE SITE ONTARIO FISHING COMMUNITY SAYS (SOMETHING SOMETHING SOMETHING) i should have wrote it down ...but it was a pop up window and i had to hit the OK button to get free from it
I haven't had many issues, but I'm not a fan of our latest software update either. Things used to be so simple before. Now you have to be a software genius just to do something out of the ordinary.
(More Reply Options) ...is there something i need to upgrade to work with the new software update?

Don't know if it's related or not but I'm always on OFC with my iPhone 5 and it usually always stays signed in and at 3am this morning it would not accept my password and took about 5 tries before I could sign in ??? That has never happened before ?? Like I said might not be related but I never ever have a problem with always being on my smartphone .... Hope we didn't get hit by a hacker or a virus ?? Huh ....

I still can't view OFC mobile properly on my Blackberry. Same issues I had months ago, if I switch the mobile page on my phone, then it defaults to the mobile page next time I go on my laptop, then I change it on my laptop and some weird pseudo-OFC shows back up on my phone...round and round I go. It really sucks navigating OFC on the phone, even a Z10 model.
I've had the same issue with my android phone.
